Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Luxor Hotel and Casino in Las Vegas (The Strip), you'll be close to Crystals at City Center and University of Nevada-Las Vegas. This casino resort is within close proximity of Bali Hai Golf Club and Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas Sign.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as irons/ironing boards and blackout drapes/curtains.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. After enjoying recreational amenities such as a nightclub and an outdoor pool, a lucky night at the casino is the perfect end to the day. This resort also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the resort's dining establishments, which include 11 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 5 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this resort consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a meal at one of the resort's dining establishments, which include 11 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 5 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Crystals at City Center - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Bali Hai Golf Club - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas Sign - 1.6 km / 1 mi
The Linq - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
High Roller - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
The Auto Collections - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Orleans Arena - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Thomas and Mack Center - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Sands Expo Convention Center - 3 km / 1.8 mi
National Atomic Testing Museum - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Desert Research Institute - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
University of Nevada-Las Vegas - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Marjorie Barrick Museum - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Town Square Las Vegas - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Fashion Show Mall - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi

The preferred airport for Luxor Hotel and Casino is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Luxor Hotel and Casino is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi.

Message.Text:
Smoking is not allowed in any of the rooms at Luxor Las Vegas. Smoking in the room will incur a cleaning fee of $300.00 payable directly to the hotel. Smoking is allowed in the casino area.

A minimum mandatory hotel-imposed fee of at least $35.00 (plus applicable tax) per room, per day, will be charged and collected by the hotel at check-in or check-out. This fee is subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees that they may be responsible for but is not a guarantee of the final amount due. For a detailed description of what is included in the mandatory fee, please see hotel policies.

Minimum self-parking fees and valet parking fees are charged by the hour per room, per vehicle. These fees are tiered by hourly increments and collected by the hotel at check in or check out. The fee amounts are subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to notify the client there are additional fees for parking and the hotel can provide the hourly parking rates at check-in.

Message.Text: Resort fees are extra and payable at the hotel.
Resort fees are extra and payable at the hotel.
Resort fees are extra and payable at the hotel.
Resort fees are extra and payable at the hotel.

Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 36-40 USD per room perday to be paid directly to the hotel. Applicable from 05/Mar/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: This hotel charges guests a daily Resort Fee of $26.00 plus tax per room, per night, payable directly to hotel. Hotel requires a USD 50 per day deposit for credit cards or cash/debit cards. Max Length-of-Stay is 14 nights. Reservations over 14-nights will not be accepted. SELF PARKING RATES: The self-parking fee is $5 for vehicles parked over 1 hour to 4 hours and $8 for vehicles parked over 4 hours to 24 hours. For vehicles self-parked over 24 hours, there is an additional self-parking fee of $8 for each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hours. VALET PARKING RATES: The valet parking fee is $8 for the first 4 hours (no grace period) and $13 for over 4 hours to 24 hours For vehicles that are valet parked over 24 hours, there is an additional valet parking fee of $13 for each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hours (no grace period). Early check in is not charged in any of MGM properties, however, based on availability at the property discretion Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 36-40 USD per room perday to be paid directly to the hotel. Applicable from 05/Mar/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: This hotel charges guests a daily Resort Fee of $29.00 plus tax per room, per night, payable directly to hotel. Hotel requires a USD 50 per day deposit for credit cards or cash/debit cards. Max Length-of-Stay is 14 nights. Reservations over 14-nights will not be accepted. SELF PARKING RATES: The self-parking fee is $5 for vehicles parked over 1 hour to 2 hours and $8 for vehicles parked over 2 to 4 hours and $10 over 24 hours VALET PARKING RATES: The valet parking fee is $10 for the first 4 hours (no grace period) and $15 for over 4 hours to 24 hours . Early check in is not charged in any of MGM properties, however, based on availability at the property discretion Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Room No: 1

All guestrooms at this property are non-smoking. Guests are responsible for all costs, damages, and liabilities caused by smoking.,Parking is available at an additional charge. Kindly contact the property for more details.,In case of early departure, guests will be responsible for the full remaining amount (room rate and tax) of the reservation.,The property offers a resort credit. Please contact the property directly for terms and conditions.,Parking fees are varied as listed below:

Valet parking:
0 to 2 hours: USD 12.00
2 - 4 hours: USD 14.00
4-24 hours: USD 16.00

Self parking:
0 - 1 hour: Complimentary
1 - 2 hours: USD 6.00
2 - 4 hours: USD 8.00
4 - 24 hours: USD 10.00,For any bookings that are made with 2 complimentary buffets promotion, it excludes dinner and is up to a USD 75 value.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Note: *Pool is open from mid March to mid September yearly.* *There is a resort fee payable by the guest.* ** minimum age check in is 21 years old.* ** Name changes are prohibited.* **This hotel has a Maximum 14 night stay restriction.* **At check in all guests will be required to present a Major Credit Card to cover applicable charges for room, tax and resort fees, as well as a incidental amount per day.** *Please be advised there is a fee for early departure.* **Please note that the rooms/suites are now all non-smoking. Guests that are found to be smoking in the room will be charged a smoking fee. ***

Essential Information: Room 1
RESORTFEE Charges: 245.00 USD (Excluded i.e. pay to hotel at the time of check-In)
